text:
To all attendees, we are still planning to hold the event. If you are affected by the hurricane, do what's right for you and your family, stay safe. There will be a livestream,  we do plan to make the recordings of each speaker available after the event as long as they turn out good.

Speakers, i sent a separate message to all of you but please let me know if this affects you so we have time to adapt.(if you've already talked to me dont worry about it)
:hand_with_index_and_middle_fingers_crossed: that the forecast is wrong and it ends up being an annoyance and not a huge deal
